nodes.text: Skin-gloves were a type of glove available during the Clone Wars in 20 BBY. During the Battle of Drongar, the Human Republic surgeon Jos Vondar wore skin-gloves while operating on wounded clone troopers on at least two different occasions. Once each surgery was completed, he would remove the gloves.
Skin-gloves first appeared in MedStar I: Battle Surgeons, the first novel in the MedStar Duology by Michael Reaves and Steve Perry, published in 2004.
